content: this text summarizes a legal case involving the dissolution of a communal property owned by three parties the property is an apartment in lissone with three rooms a kitchen a bathroom and a basement cellar the court has determined that the property cannot be divided among the coowners due to technical and economic reasons so it will be sold the court has authorized the sale and issued a nonfinal judgment to proceed with it the court in monza has made a final decision to dissolve the joint ownership of the property which includes the apartment and a separate garage the court has identified the specific details of the property in the cadastre records the court has declared that the property can be divided into separate lots and has ordered the sale through a separate legal process the decision was made on august 1 2012 and officially recorded on september 17 2012
